Welcome to amic tradings services ltd

Amic Trading Services Ltd is a prominent player in the trading and distribution industry, specializing in the procurement and supply of heavy machinery, industrial components, spare parts, and related services. With a steadfast commitment to excellence and a strong presence in key markets, Amic Trading Services Ltd has established itself as a reliable partner for businesses seeking high-quality equipment, components, and technical support.

About us

More information

Our unwavering commitment to quality, comprehensive product offerings, technical expertise, and strategic presence in multiple countries underscore its position as a leading player in the trading and distribution industry.

Whether it's heavy machinery, industrial components, cargo containers, technical support, or logistics solutions, Amic stands ready to meet the diverse needs of its clients and contribute to their success.

01. Trading of Heavy Machinery and Industrial Components

Amic Trading Services Ltd prides itself on its comprehensive range of heavy machinery, catering to diverse industries such as metalworking, manufacturing, and transportation. The company offers an extensive selection of metalworking machines, small-scale machinery, and heavy-duty trucks, providing businesses with the tools they need to enhance productivity and operational efficiency.

In addition to machinery, Amic Trading Services Ltd is a trusted source for a wide variety of industrial components and spare parts. These include essential items such as hydraulic filters, gears, injector pipes, cylinders, outriggers, and valves. The company's commitment to supplying genuine and high-quality parts ensures that clients can rely on their equipment for optimal performance and longevity.

  • hydraulic filters
  • injector pipes
  • outriggers
  • cylinders
  • gears
  • valves

02. Container Supply and Maintenance

Amic Trading Services Ltd extends its expertise beyond machinery and components into the realm of cargo containers. The company offers a range of large cargo containers, specializing in providing both new and well-maintained empty containers. These containers play a vital role in the logistics and transportation industry, facilitating the movement of goods across borders and ensuring secure storage during transit.

03. Technical Support and Services

One of Amic Trading Services Ltd's key strengths lies in its dedication to providing technical support to its clients. The company's team of skilled professionals is well-versed in the intricacies of the heavy machinery and industrial component sectors. This technical expertise enables Amic Trading Services Ltd to offer valuable support, troubleshooting, and maintenance services, ensuring that clients' operations remain smooth and uninterrupted.

04. Warehousing, Handling, and Freight Logistics

Amic Trading Services Ltd offers a comprehensive suite of services beyond equipment and parts supply. The company is actively involved in warehousing, handling, and freight logistics, providing end-to-end solutions for businesses' storage and transportation needs. With a strategic approach to logistics, Amic Trading Services Ltd contributes to streamlined supply chains and efficient distribution processes.

05. Countries of Operation

Amic Trading Services Ltd's reach extends across multiple countries, contributing to its status as a globally recognized player in the trading and distribution sector. The company operates in several key markets, including Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda, China, and the United Arab Emirates. This expansive geographical presence positions Amic Trading Services Ltd as a reliable partner for businesses seeking to source equipment, components, and services in these regions.
